title: Verify IntroOverlay animation on page load
description: Ensure that the IntroOverlay component animates in on app load and animates out smoothly, then disappears fully leaving the main page visible.

steps.description: Load the application in a browser.
Observe IntroOverlay animation starts immediately on load.
Confirm IntroOverlay animates out smoothly after initial display.
Verify that IntroOverlay is removed from the DOM, leaving main page content visible without flash or errors.

title: Open InquiryBoard overlay from main page
description: Test that clicking '고객 문의' button opens the InquiryBoard overlay properly with correct z-index layering above main content.

steps.description: Wait for IntroOverlay to disappear after page load.
Click on the '고객 문의' navigation button.
Confirm that the InquiryBoard overlay appears above all other content and overlays backgrounds properly.
Verify overlay has correct z-index stacking, blocking underlying page interactions.

title: Create new public inquiry successfully
description: Verify that a normal user can open inquiry form, submit a new public inquiry, and see the list updated immediately with form cleared.

steps.description: Open InquiryBoard overlay.
Click '문의하기' to open the new inquiry form.
Fill in inquiry title, body, and submit without enabling secret toggle.
Submit the inquiry form.
Verify that the new inquiry shows at the top of the inquiry list.
Confirm that the form input fields are cleared after submission.
Verify no React warnings or errors in console during submission.

title: Create new secret inquiry and require password for viewing
description: Verify that a user can post a secret inquiry, and normal users are prompted for password to view details.

steps.description: Open InquiryBoard overlay and open new inquiry form.
Fill in inquiry title and body, enable secret toggle, set inquiry password, then submit.
Attempt to open the posted secret inquiry item from normal user mode.
Verify that a custom modal prompts for the secret password.
Enter incorrect password and attempt to view details.
Confirm access is denied and an error message is shown.
Enter correct password and submit.
Verify inquiry details and any replies are displayed correctly.

title: Admin user can bypass secret inquiry password
description: Verify that when admin toggle mode is ON, admin users can view secret inquiries without password prompt.

steps.description: Toggle admin mode ON in InquiryBoard.
Click on a secret inquiry item from the inquiry list.
Verify the inquiry details and replies are displayed immediately without password prompt.

title: Admin user can post replies to inquiries
description: Verify admin can toggle admin mode, open an inquiry, post reply, and see reply appear instantly in inquiry detail.

steps.description: Toggle admin mode ON.
Open any inquiry detail.
Enter reply text in reply form and submit.
Verify reply appears in inquiry detail immediately.
Confirm a visible badge or visual indicator of the reply is shown.

title: Admin can delete inquiries and list updates
description: Verify admin mode allows deleting inquiries and inquiry list updates reflecting deletion instantly.

steps.description: Toggle admin mode ON.
Select an inquiry to delete from the list.
Click the delete button and confirm deletion via custom modal.
Verify the inquiry is removed from the list immediately.
Confirm no React warnings or errors in the console.

title: Responsive layout adapts from desktop to mobile
description: Verify InquiryBoard inquiry list and detail components split side-by-side on desktop and stack vertically in mobile viewport.

steps.description: Open InquiryBoard on a desktop resolution (>= 1024px wide).
Verify inquiry list and inquiry detail are displayed side-by-side.
Resize viewport to mobile size (< 640px width).
Confirm inquiry list and detail stack vertically.

title: Native dialogs replaced with custom modal dialogs
description: Verify all native alert, prompt, and confirm dialogs for password input, deletion confirmations, and error messages are replaced with styled custom modal components.

steps.description: Trigger password prompt by opening secret inquiry as normal user.
Confirm native prompt dialog is not shown; custom modal is displayed for password entry instead.
Trigger a deletion confirmation as admin.
Verify custom confirm modal is shown, not native confirm dialog.
Trigger validation error by submitting empty inquiry form.
Confirm error message is displayed in custom modal or inline validation, no native alert used.

title: Check for no React key warnings or invalid props in console
description: Verify that during inquiry list rendering, inquiry creation, and admin operations there are no React key warnings or invalid DOM property warnings in browser console.

steps.description: Perform multiple inquiry creations and deletions.
Switch between admin and user modes and open inquiry details.
Monitor browser console for no React warnings related to keys or invalid props.

title: Network requests to backend return status 200 and consistent data
description: Verify all API interactions with the mock backend endpoint /inquiries via axios return HTTP 200 status and response data matches UI inquiry list and details.

steps.description: Open InquiryBoard and load inquiry list.
Verify GET /inquiries returns HTTP 200 with inquiry data matching UI list.
Create a new inquiry and observe POST request.
Confirm POST /inquiries returns HTTP 200 and new inquiry data reflects in response.
Admin replies to an inquiry and DELETE an inquiry.
Verify PUT/DELETE requests return HTTP 200 and UI updates accordingly.

title: Verify inquiry list container handles overflow with smooth scrolling
description: Ensure that the inquiry list container has proper CSS overflow handling and scrolls smoothly when the list exceeds container height on both desktop and mobile layouts.

steps.description: Populate inquiry list with enough inquiries to exceed container height.
Check that inquiry list container scrolls vertically without layout breaking.
Verify smooth scroll animations and no jitter or flicker during scroll.

title: Close InquiryBoard overlay returns to main landing page
description: Verify the InquiryBoard overlay closes properly when the close button is clicked, returning user back to the main landing page with no residual overlays or UI artifacts.

steps.description: Open InquiryBoard overlay.
Click the close button on the InquiryBoard overlay.
Confirm the overlay disappears and main landing page content is fully interactive.
Verify z-index layering resets properly with no hidden overlay elements.
